ksatools 0.4.3
  • Reference

ksatools

Tools to make my R life easier.

See the function reference for documentation.

Installation

Just copy/paste the following:

if(!require(devtools)) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("kasperskytte/ksatools")
